Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Enable unified agent discovery, governance, security, observability, and seamless integration across Microsoft 365 by building agents with the Microsoft Agent Framework or Agent 365 SDK on any AI stack. Learn key steps, tools, and best practices through live demos and insights from the experts.
